message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you a counteroffer of $11000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product brings. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, so I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $10000. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and that's $11500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value. Let me know if you're interested.
